Notes: A sandstorm enemy that moves on a path. Sucks the player in once they get in its range. If the player shakes their Wiimote, they will be launched into the air. SunakazeKun may use two spiky rock obstacles to defend itself.

Obj_arg0.Name: Enable Rock Obstacles?
Obj_arg0.Description: Enables the two spiky rock obstacles if set.

Obj_arg1.Name: Enable White Color?
Obj_arg1.Description: Starts the "White" color animation if enabled.

SW_A.Description: Activated whenever the player does not get launched.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
